DOC.brief_summary: The Initiate Maintain Physical Activity Clinics ( IMPACT ) study determine optimal feasible level frequency structure contact need clinical set adult patient Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus initiate maintain physical activity recommendation long-term .
DOC.brief_title: Initiate Maintain Physical Activity Clinics : The IMPACT Diabetes Study
DOC.detailed_description: The IMPACT Study compare health outcome lifestyle habit amongst three group study participant . Study participant randomize three exercise group . Group 1 participate instructor-led exercise training session 1 time per week , 24 week ( approximately 6 month ) . Group 2 participate instructor-led exercise training session 3 time per week , 24 week ( approximately 6 month ) . Group 3 attend instructor-led exercise training session . All group encourage see usual provider routine healthcare , continue usual medication regimen .
DOC.criteria: Recent hemoglobin A1c result 7 11.0 % At least one visit Stanford primary care department precede 24 month Diagnosed Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Able willing enroll meet requirement study Inability speak , read understand English Longterm current use dependency insulin Systolic blood pressure > 180 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure > 100 mm Hg Resting heart rate > 120 bpm History present heart cardiovascular condition History present respiratory disease History present spinal cord injury History stroke Transient Ischemic Attack ( TIA ) History cancer diagnosis past 5 year present cancer diagnosis Medical , psychiatric , behavioral limitation may interfere study participation Participating clinical trial may interfere study procedure outcomes Currently pregnant plan become pregnant within three year Plans away four week next nine month Plans leave community within five year
